definition[0]: relating to or involving the nucleus (=central part) of an atom, or the energy produced when the nucleus of an atom is either split or joined with the nucleus of another atom
definition[1]: relating to or involving the use of weapons that use nuclear energy
example[3]: With the collapse of the former Soviet Union, the possibility of a nuclear holocaust (=a nuclear war that destroys much of the Earth) was greatly reduced.
example[6]: concern about the country’s nuclear weapons program
